title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.4 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.4 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to any facility in New York State, which
has been certified by the division or an out patient facility certified by the

Office of Mental Health which has on its staff one or more persons who
specialize in the treatment of alcoholism and other alcohol related problems. When any such facility provides preventive alcoholism counseling services to a
child whose parent is an alcoholic or alcohol abuser or who is living in a home
with an alcoholic abusing person, such services shall be provided in accordance
with the provisions of this Part. Notes

305.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
